title: How to Beat a Friend in Halo Blood Gulch

steps.headline: Get the sniper rifle on top of each building.
steps.description: Do it as quickly as possible.

steps.headline: Make sure you strafe while sniping or being sniped.
steps.description: Standing still or walking in a straight line makes you an easy target to a player with any level of skill.

steps.headline: You can also try using the nearest scorpion tank.
steps.description: They can be extremely powerful, but you can easily be sniped so I would be careful. A banshee is not recommended if your opponent has a tank, as unless you are an exceptional flyer you will be an easy target. If you are using the banshee, when you are trying to splatter them watch out for people with rockets or nades.

steps.headline: Use the scorpion tank to crush or shoot your friend dead.
steps.description: Don't stop firing the machine gun because it has unlimited ammo. Aim carefully at your enemy and fire the main gun. It should kill in one shot.

steps.headline: In a tank your body is exposed in the front.
steps.description: If you only it's back to the enemy you are no longer a sniper target and can kill them easily.

steps.headline: If your enemy is also in a scorpion tank, a hit anywhere with a tank round will kill him.
If your shields drop, retreat.
steps.description: Use the hilly terrain to your advantage. Try not to get trapped in a corner of your base.

steps.headline: Use the health packs on top of each base.
steps.description: There is also an overshield inside the cave along with a flamethrower, so if you are doing slayer or infection hide in there.

text: Get the sniper rifle on top of each building. Do it as quickly as possible. Make sure you strafe while sniping or being sniped. Standing still or walking in a straight line makes you an easy target to a player with any level of skill. You can also try using the nearest scorpion tank. They can be extremely powerful, but you can easily be sniped so I would be careful. A banshee is not recommended if your opponent has a tank, as unless you are an exceptional flyer you will be an easy target. If you are using the banshee, when you are trying to splatter them watch out for people with rockets or nades. Use the scorpion tank to crush or shoot your friend dead. Don't stop firing the machine gun because it has unlimited ammo. Aim carefully at your enemy and fire the main gun. It should kill in one shot. In a tank your body is exposed in the front. If you only it's back to the enemy you are no longer a sniper target and can kill them easily. If your enemy is also in a scorpion tank, a hit anywhere with a tank round will kill him.  If your shields drop, retreat. Use the hilly terrain to your advantage. Try not to get trapped in a corner of your base. Use the health packs on top of each base. There is also an overshield inside the cave along with a flamethrower, so if you are doing slayer or infection hide in there.
